original_definition: 'alert state trigger time' means the time before alert state becomes active;
generated_definition: 'alert state trigger time' means time period longer than the alert state trigger time or the standard frequency range for a time period longer than time to restore frequency

Article 3: ‘alert state trigger time’ means the time before alert state becomes active;
Article 18: the absolute value of the steady state system frequency deviation has continuously exceeded 50 % of the maximum steady state frequency deviation for a time period longer than the alert state trigger time or the standard frequency range for a time period longer than time to restore frequency; or
